message:
SYSTEM: PlanetData_SIMON_OEGPresentation_oct16.pdf: Página 13
SIMON Project (1/2)
http://simon-project.eu/
Time frame: Jan 2014 – Dec 2016
Description: demonstration-oriented project with 3 large scale pilots in Lisbon, 
Parma, and Madrid aiming to use ICT services to promote the independent 
living and societal participation of mobility impaired people in the context of 
public parking areas and multiple transport modes.
speaker: SYSTEM
